location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photocopy of Part of a Map Showing the Mouth of the Shatt al-Arab

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in black and white on paper, with additions in coloured penDimensions: On sheet 553 x 452mm

mods.abstract: This photocopy of part of a map shows the mouth of the Shatt al-Arab on the Persian Gulf. It is labelled ‘Copy of part of map forwarded with Foreign Office letter N.B. The copy is not to the same scale as the map. Hydrographic Department Admiralty 22nd Jan[uar]y 1929.’Scale not given.
